lexa.core.data

Class BaseValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • lexa.core.data.BaseValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Value
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigValue, HashValue, SimpleValue

    public abstract class BaseValue
extends java.lang.Object
implements Value
    Provide the type safe getters for a value.

    This provides the getters for the specific types supported. It does not implement the basic getValue method

    Since:
    2016-01
    Author:
    william
